description: This file is a C++ header defining a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock for unit testing. It inherits from multiple interfaces related to storage and cache functionalities, and uses Google Mock to mock the methods.
external_methods: MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, SetValue, (const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetValue, (const string& ns, const string& key, string& value), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, DeleteKey, (const string& ns, const string& key), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, SetValue, (const IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value, const uint32_t ttl), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetValue, (const IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, string& value, uint32_t& ttl), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, DeleteKey, (const IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, DeleteNamespace, (const IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetKeys, (const IStoreInspector::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, IStringIterator*& keys), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetNamespaces, (const IStoreInspector::ScopeType scope, IStringIterator*& namespaces), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetStorageSizes, (const IStoreInspector::ScopeType scope, INamespaceSizeIterator*& storageList), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, GetNamespaceStorageLimit, (const IStoreLimit::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, uint32_t& size), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, SetNamespaceStorageLimit, (const IStoreLimit::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const uint32_t size), (override))

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class that implements multiple storage and cache interfaces for unit testing purposes, using Google Mock.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for store events.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Sets a value in the store within a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Retrieves a value from the store within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Deletes a key from a namespace in the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Deletes an entire namespace from the store.

methods.name: Register (IStore2)
methods.description: Registers a notification callback specific to IStore2.

methods.name: Unregister (IStore2)
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback specific to IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Sets a scoped value with optional TTL.

methods.name: GetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Retrieves a scoped value with TTL.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Retrieves keys in a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Retrieves storage sizes in a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Gets the storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Sets the storage limit for a namespace.
